info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of transactions adjacent to a specific transaction

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash of the reference transaction

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction of adjacent transactions to retrieve

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of transactions to skip before starting to return results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the transactions

lt.description: The logical time of the transaction

account.description: The account address involved in the transaction

origStatus.description: The original status of the account

endStatus.description: The end status of the account

totalFees.description: The total fees for the transaction
